Anushka Shetty Wiki | Height | Weight | Age | Affairs | Biography

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Anushka Shetty is an Indian actress, Model and former Yoga Teacher who is working in Telugu and Tamil films. She is especially known for her extraordinary characters like Arundathi, Rudhrama Devi, Devsena, and many others. She performed in many hit films like Vaanam, Damarukam, Alex Pandian, Singham II, Iraandam Ulagam, Linga and many more.

Biography & Wiki

Anushka Shetty’s real name is Sweety Shetty and her Nickname is Mac. She was born on 7 November 1981 in Mangalore, Karnataka, India. Therefore, her current age is 38 years. Anushka’s Zodiac is Scorpio. She currently resides in Hyderabad, Telangana, India.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Anushka is the daughter of A.N. Vittal Shetty and her mother’s name is Prafulla Shetty. Her brothers are Gunaranjan Shetty who us a Businessman and Sai Ramesh Shetty who is a Doctor. She is from the Hindu Bunt community.

Education and School, College

Anushka completed her Bachelor of Computer Applications degree from Mount Carmel College, Bengaluru, India. After completion of her studies in Bangalore, she started her career as a Yoga instructor.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

It was rumored that Anushka Shetty dated Director Krish whose real name is Radhakrishna Jagarlamudi. Both had worked together in the film Vedam. Even they moved in together. Also as per media Anushka dated with Prabhas who is co-starring with her in epic action film Baahubali.

Favorite Things

Anushka Shetty filmography

Anushka made her on-screen debut in 2005 with Telugu Movie Super. She is now one of the leading & commercial successful film actresses in the Telegu film industry. She ger her first Filmfare Award for Best Actress – Telugu, Nandi Award, Cinema Award for Best Actress for her dual roles in the dark fantasy Arundhati. She got her first success with ‘Vikramarkudu’ (2006), opposite Ravi Teja.

Anushka Shetty debuts the Tamil film industry with Rendu in 2006. In 2006, she got the first movie form SS Rajamouli paired with Ravi Teja named, Vikramarkudu. This film became a successful film and got lots of admiration from people of Telangana and Andhra Pradesh. In 2007, a remake of Sarfarosh named as Astrum and Stalin has made a place for her in the south film industry.

She worked in a blockbuster Film Baahubali 2: The Conclusion in 2017, where she played Maharai Devasena. This film is all time Blockbuster and crossed 1000 crores in Worldwide box office collection in just 10 Days. She is the only actress to have worked with S.S. Rajamouli for more than once.

Awards and recognition

Anushka received many honored and awards for her acting skills. She declared as Bangalore Most Desirable Women 2010, Banglore Times Most Desirable Women-Kannada 2013, Hyderabad Most Desirable Women 2015, Hyderabad Most Desirable Women 2016-Telugu, and Chennai Times Most Desirable Women 2016 – Tamil.

Salary and Net Worth

Anushka Shetty has an estimated net worth of almost $5 Million or ₹35 crores. She earns almost ₹1 to ₹2 crores for every movie she plays.

Contact Address 

6th floor, Woods Apartments, 
Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, 
Telangana, India

Facts About Anushka Shetty

  • She highest-paid actress in the south Indian movie industry. Also, She demanded Rs 5 crore for the movie “Rudramadevi” directed by Gunasekhar in 2015.
  • In November 2011, the Income Tax department officials raided her residence in Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, in regards to their Income Tax returns. According to reports, the officials seized cash, bank passbooks and other documents from her residence.
  • Anushka has proved her versatility as an actress in 2015 for the movie “Size Zero”. Moreover, She has gained 20 kg weight for the role to give real character.
  • She is the only actor who has worked more than one with SS Rajamouli.
  • In 2015, She voted as Hyderabad times the most desirable woman.
  • Anushka Became second Indian actress after Sridevi who has $1 Million grosser at the USA Box Office.
  • Anushka was a yoga teacher under renowned yoga master, Bharat Thakur, before getting into acting.
  • Though she made her film debut in 2005, her first success came up with ‘Vikramarkudu’ (2006), opposite Ravi Teja.
